meta.description: What does it mean to be spiritually immune?  Does it apply to everyone?  And what does this mean for COVID vaccines? We've got a great lineup of guests to talk about what Christian Science offers to the process of navigating the health issues connected to the pandemic.

title: Vaccines, immunity, and the pathway to health / Christian Science Sentinel
cleaned_text: What does it mean to be spiritually immune? Does it apply to everyone? And what does this mean for COVID vaccines? We've got a great lineup of guests to talk about what Christian Science offers to the process of navigating the health issues connected to the pandemic.
